shortdesc.ph: Updates the spatial position of the specified remote user.

p.codeblock: public abstract int updateRemotePosition(int uid, RemoteVoicePositionInfo posInfo);
virtual int updateRemotePosition(uid_t uid, const RemoteVoicePositionInfo &posInfo) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|ILocalSpatialAudioEngine") int UpdateRemotePosition(int64 uid, FRemoteVoicePositionInfo& posInfo);
public abstract int UpdateRemotePosition(uint uid, RemoteVoicePositionInfo posInfo);
Future<void> updateRemotePosition( {required int uid, required RemoteVoicePositionInfo posInfo});

section.title: Details
section.p: After successfully calling this method, the SDK calculates the spatial audio parameters based on the relative position of the local and remote user.

plentry.props: native unreal bp flutter rn electron unity cs
plentry.pd: The spatial position of the remote user. See .

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
